name: PowerBIReportDeploy
description: Deploys a PowerBI Report to a PowerBI Workspace
author: Steffen Kampmann

inputs.name: reportPath
inputs.label: Report Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the pbix file of the report

inputs.name: reportName
inputs.label: Report Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the report in the workspace

inputs.name: workspaceName
inputs.label: Workspace Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the workspace to deploy the report to
